Title: The Color Blue
Plot: The firm celebrates as they hit a milestone. Peggy and Paul compete to secure the same account.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Embeth Davidtz, Abigail Spencer, Charles Shaughnessy, Marshall Allman, Peyton List, Crista Flanagan, Laura Regan, Ryan Cartwright, Mary Anne McGarry, Alexa Alemanni
